subject: p15192710
History: Evaluation of chest tube position after readjustment.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was compared to obtained at 9:07 pm. The left chest tube has been slightly pulled distally. There is no change in the left lower lung opacity as well as subcutaneous air in the right chest wall. No pneumothorax is seen.
